author: ashish
msg: Improvement on createPartyRelationship service suggested by RolandH on the user mailing list.

author: dreiss
msg: Fix a few minor issues with the initial Thrift site.

author: joerg
msg: Cocoon's pipeline buffer increases from an initial buffer size of 8192 bytes to the configurable flush buffer size rather than allocating the complete buffer beforehand.

author: ningjiang
msg: Added unitest to show how to work with the camel-cxf endpoint's Holders message in processor
